short.description: Use when components require minor changes, micro-Interactions, and fades

medium.description: Use when components require medium changes, small expansions, and notifications

long.description: Use when components require major changes, expansions, and distance movement

short.description: Expansions and other change in states that require attention during movement

long.description: Alerts, notifications, sheets and other mediations that enter the screen with movement

enter.description: Decelerated easing. Use when an object enters from out of screen to reveal extra information.

exit.description: Accelerated easing. Use when object leaves the screen to hide element.

transition.description: Standard easing. Use to transition between different states of the same element in screen.

emphasize.description: Elastic easing. Use to draw attention to a specific action or specific information. Duration must be over 200ms.
